entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Arviat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:26 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then blizzard. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
